bike.description: 6061 aluminum triple butted main tubes with hydroformed top and down tube, taper guage “S" bend stays, replaceable derailleur hanger, eyeletted dropouts and seatstay rack mounts

components.description: Full carbon composite with brake mounts, low-rider carrier mounts and forged dropouts with single eyelets
Shimano R500 wheelset, 20/24H, 24mm rim profile, R500 forged aluminum loose ball hubs with bladed stainless steel spokes
Vittoria Randonneur with Double Shield puncture protection and reflective sidewalls, 700 x 32c
Shimano Tiagra RD-4600 SS rear and Shimano Taigra FD-4600 bottom pull front
Full alloy platform, toe clip attachable
Jamis flat bar, 6061 T-6 aluminum, 31.8 x 10JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 580mm
NVO Components TM-3 adjustable threadless system (ATS) forged aluminum stem, 10JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (15/17"), 105mm (19/21"), 115mm (23"). ATS shim length 100mm
Anatomic double density kraton grip with end plug
Jamis alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 350mm alloy clamp with QR seatpin
Selle San Marco Elba with Syntex + Kev cover and carbon steel rails
